reviewsJson.markdown:
**rda**/ velocity

**% Used**/ 5 **coil**/ Clapton  **w**/ 55      
      
**Steep time**/ 2 weeks **wicking**/  full 
  
**Mouth Feel** - Super dense and fluffy. Very heavy on the tongue with no throat hit. I would give it a 9 out of 10 in density.      

**Flavor Properties** -  Nice and creamy dairy, moderately eggy, very buttery without being greasy with a smooth Rich vanilla, and in my opinion the perfect level of sweetness.

**Relatable Flavors** - If you ever made custard ice cream it's a lot like tasting the custard before you put it in the ice cream maker, or a  homemade vanilla pudding.

**Off Flavors** - Just the lightest greasy flavor.

**Position in the recipe** - Should work as an accent or in a base at low percentages. A strong flavor that should be able to take the top in any cream recipe.

**Pairings** - The list is really endless here I have yet to find a flavor but doesn't work on some level with this flavoring.

Works well with creams, chocolates, fruits, bakeries, and savory flavors such as coffee I think I'm going to try it with a little bit of I anice fa for a creamy black licorice.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Vanilla Custard V1
